  Megatron Revived:

  After she went into her quarters, h=
e sighed and unceremoniously sat down in the middle of the floor, having no=
 quarters of his own.  He would have to watch her carefully, she was possib=

ns.

  Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:
    Blacknightmare:

    Walked=

that Hellplague wasn't doing a visit.In other hand she was, thinking bitter=
y what had happened among her and Malice and all those ocasion that she cou=
ld had avoided to tell Malice the true. How bitter was now her desire to di=

cked her door's quarters down, she didn't desires that any person visits he=
